Today, Dan and Jordan ease back into the groove by checking out what Alex was up to at the end of 2003. In this installment, Alex warns of drug dogs trained in Eastern Europe, discusses alleged plans to blame Cuba for a space false flag in 1962, and takes calls from antisemitic callers from multiple countries.

==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2022/12/27/episode-780-december-9-10-2003 Episode #760: December 9-10, 2003]</ref>:

*The [https://www.aclu.org/other/model-state-emergency-health-powers-act ACLU opposed] Model State Emergency Health Powers Act
*Only a few states actually [https://web.archive.org/web/20080413162344/http://www.publichealthlaw.net/Resources/ResourcesPDFs/MSPHA%20LegisTrack.pdf passed legislation based on the Act]
*Alex's version of the [https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2014/10/14/world/middleeast/us-casualties-of-iraq-chemical-weapons.html US selling West Nile to Iraq] is [https://www.upi.com/Archives/1990/10/03/CDC-downplays-report-it-supplied-virus-for-weapons/9196654926400/ not accurate]
*Alex is way off about [https://www.baltimoresun.com/news/bs-xpm-1999-11-18-9911180290-story.html the arctic] [https://definingmomentscanada.ca/1918-influenza-pandemic/history/excavating-the-flu/ excavations of bodies], searching for remnants of the 1918 flu
*The [https://www.aclu.org/press-releases/landmark-settlement-reached-notorious-school-drug-raid-caught-tape ACLU represented students] who were targeted in the Stratford High School raid
*The drug dog was [http://www.mapinc.org/drugnews/v03/n1890/a06.html?999 not trained in Czechoslovakia]
*Alex is a bit off in his ideas about [https://nsarchive2.gwu.edu/news/20010430/northwoods.pdf Operation Northwoods]
*[https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2022/10/13/positive-views-of-european-union-reach-new-highs-in-many-countries/ft_2022-10-13_viewsoftheeu_01/ Favorability ratings for the EU]
